quotes.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life
quotes.short: "Art washes away the dust of everyday life" - Picasso

quotes.quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream
quotes.short: "I dream my painting and I paint my dream" - Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned
quotes.short: "Art is never finished, only abandoned" - da Vinci

quotes.quote: I must have flowers, always, and always
Have no fear of perfection, you'll never reach it
I paint myself because I am so often alone
quotes.short: "I paint myself because I am alone" - Kahlo

quotes.quote: Creativity takes courage
Color is the keyboard, the eyes are the harmonies
Art is what you can get away with
quotes.short: "Art is what you can get away with" - Warhol

quotes.quote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it
quotes.short: "Every stone has a statue inside" - Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see
quotes.short: "Art is what you make others see" - Degas

quotes.quote: I could paint for a hundred years without stopping
quotes.short: "I could paint for a hundred years" - Cézanne

quotes.quote: I found I could say things with color that I couldn't say any other way
Choose only one master—Nature
A line is a dot that went for a walk
quotes.short: "A line is a dot that went for a walk" - Klee

quotes.quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works
Every good painter paints what he is
quotes.short: "Every painter paints what he is" - Pollock

quotes.quote: Color is a matter of taste and of sensitivity
quotes.short: "Color is a matter of taste" - Manet

quotes.quote: Why shouldn't art be pretty? There are enough unpleasant things in the world
Without light, there is no beauty
The mind loves the unknown
I have always tried to hide my efforts and wished my works to have the light joyousness of springtime
All art is erotic
From my rotting body, flowers shall grow
quotes.short: "From my body, flowers shall grow" - Munch

quotes.quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable
I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life.
quotes.short: "I think about life, not art" - Basquiat

quotes.quote: Art is for everybody.
Polka dots are a way to infinity.
Creativity is the power to reject the past, to change the status quo, and to seek new potential.
I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.
Art is the path to being spiritual.
quotes.short: "Art is the path to spiritual" - Mondrian

quotes.quote: Silence is so accurate.
The job of the artist is always to deepen the mystery.
I prefer living in color.
You change the world by being yourself.
The artist is present.
Art is something that happens inside you.
I want it to be revealing. I want it to be the truth.
quotes.short: "I want it to be the truth" - Hirst

quotes.quote: My life is art.
I wish I could treat every day as Halloween, and get dressed up and go out into the world as some eccentric character.
Art is a guaranty of sanity.
Art is the highest form of hope.
quotes.short: "Art is highest form of hope" - Richter

quotes.quote: Artists don't make objects. Artists make mythologies.
Focusing isn't just an optical activity, it is also a mental one.
What you see is what you see.
quotes.short: "What you see is what you see" - Stella

quotes.quote: The idea becomes a machine that makes the art.
It isn't necessary for a work to have a lot of things to look at, to have something to look at.
It is what it is and it ain't nothing else.
Painting relates to both art and life. Neither can be made. (I try to act in that gap between the two.)
quotes.short: "Act in gap between art and life" - Rauschenberg

quotes.quote: Take an object. Do something to it. Do something else to it.
My line is childlike but not childish.
I have worked to free shape from its ground.
Beauty is the mystery of life.
Life doesn't last; art doesn't last. It doesn't matter.
The true artist helps the world by revealing mystic truths.
I consider space to be a material.
Light is not so much something that reveals, as it is itself the revelation.
Art is not an object; it is an experience.
I like the idea of the body as a vessel.
I want to be a painter of modern life, and modern bodies.
I want the paint to be flesh.
Art is a way of recognizing oneself.
I paint people I love.
I don't want to paint life, I want to paint the life of the mind.
You can't be born in Birmingham, Alabama, in 1955 and grow up in South Central [Los Angeles] near the Black Panthers headquarters, and not feel like you've got some kind of social responsibility.
I want to make things that are beautiful.
I like the idea of mapping.
I am interested in the multifaceted layers of place, space, and time.
Females carry the marks, language and nuances of their culture more than the male.
Art grows out of each particular situation.
The drawing is a way of thinking.
I see my work as a visual dialogue.
I want the work to have a physical effect on the viewer.
The artwork is an act of memory.
I don't want to be a master. I want to be a beginner.
quotes.short: "I want to be a beginner" - Orozco

quotes.quote: Sometimes doing something poetic can become political.
I'm not an artist. I'm an image maker.
My aesthetic is a misunderstanding.
I don't paint for an audience.
Gunpowder is spontaneous and unpredictable.
Words are the most basic element of human culture.
The body is the only direct way I can know society and the world.
I want to paint the reality of life.
Art is about emotion.
I like the idea of a word becoming a picture.
I will not make any more boring art.
I shop therefore I am.
Protect me from what I want.
quotes.short: "Protect me from what I want" - Holzer

quotes.quote: I am my own muse.
I like to think of my pictures as movies.
I am interested in the human species.
I want to make pictures that feel like life.
I photograph my life.
I look for perfection in form.
